title: Implement left nav with sections
description:
Redesign the navigation to use a left-hand sidebar with collapsible sections instead of the top nav bar.

Sections:
- Main: HTML Workbench, Site Browser, Profile Manager
- Analysis: Page Analysis, Site Analysis
- Admin: Kanban Board, Version Viewer
- Dev: API Explorer, Docs Viewer, Settings

The right sidebar should remain for transient panels (Events, API Log, Automation).

comments.author: human
comments.text: The top nav is getting crowded. Move to a left sidebar with sections to organize apps better.

checklist.item: Create new shell layout with left sidebar
Keep right sidebar for debug panels
